ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD takes a chilling look at global warming, and explodes the myths about Diet Coke and Mentos! MAD also spoofs Gap ads, The Amazing Race, the 5-second rule and celebrity apologies! Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Monroe, the Strip Club and more!
